title: Google\Cloud\Bigtable\Admin\V2\Cluster
name: Cluster
description:
A resizable group of nodes in a particular cloud location, capable of serving all [Tables][google.bigtable.admin.v2.Table] in the parent [Instance][google.bigtable.admin.v2.Instance].

Generated from protobuf message google.bigtable.admin.v2.Cluster

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.name
params.description: The unique name of the cluster. Values are of the form projects/{project}/instances/{instance}/clusters/[a-z][-a-z0-9]*.

params.name: data.location
params.description: Immutable. The location where this cluster's nodes and storage reside. For best performance, clients should be located as close as possible to this cluster. Currently only zones are supported, so values should be of the form projects/{project}/locations/{zone}.

params.name: data.state
params.description: Output only. The current state of the cluster.

params.name: data.serve_nodes
params.description: The number of nodes allocated to this cluster. More nodes enable higher throughput and more consistent performance.

params.name: data.default_storage_type
params.description: Immutable. The type of storage used by this cluster to serve its parent instance's tables, unless explicitly overridden.

params.name: data.encryption_config
params.description: Immutable. The encryption configuration for CMEK-protected clusters.
